attributes.action: comment on a speach by Cicero in 55BC - "The budget should be balanced; the Treasury should be re-filled; the public debt should be reduced; the arrogance of officialdom should be tempered  and controlled; the assistance to foreign lands should be curtailed lest we become bankrupt; people must again learn to work rather than living on public assistance".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
